events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car on 2024-04-30, requesting immediate claim initiation.
Upon review, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of the insured vehicle in a traffic collision.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle the car accident claim and coordinate further processes.
The insurer has formally acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured the customer of prompt support.
Documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimate were requested to proceed with claim assessment.
The insured submitted all requested documents electronically, including detailed photos and the accident report for evaluation.
The claims department began investigation to verify the circumstances of the vehicle collision and damage assessment.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident details as reported and damage scope consistent with the collision incident.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair costs and policy coverage limits for the auto accident claim.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the insurer for timely processing.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms and verification of all documentation.
Insurance payment was issued to cover the repair expenses of the vehicle as agreed in the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment and vehicle repair completion.
All records and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
